properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:01PM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations
from 0.10 to 0.30 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph On
Sunday.

* WHERE...Eastern Chittenden County.

* WHEN...Freezing rain is expected to develop later tonight into
Sunday morning. Precipitation will end as a brief period of
light snow or snow showers Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible
due to the ice. Travel could be very difficult tonight into
Sunday owing to icy roads.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain
overnight as colder air moves southward across the Champlain
Valley. Roads will become icy after midnight into the early
morning hours on Sunday.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
